nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@return the address of the owner.
nodes.name: owner

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
nodes.name: mod

nodes.documentation: @title Federation interface.
nodes.name: IFederation

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns whether a specific member exists in the federation.
 @param _member address The public address of the member to check.
nodes.name: isMember

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the federation members.
nodes.name: getMembers

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the required threshold for consensus.
nodes.name: getConsensusThreshold

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the revision of the current federation.
nodes.name: getFederationRevision
isMemberByRevision

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the federation members by revision.
 @param _federationRevision uint The revision to query.
nodes.name: getMembersByRevision

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the required threshold for consensus by revision.
 @param _federationRevision uint The revision to query.
nodes.name: getConsensusThresholdByRevision

nodes.documentation: @title Upgradable smart contract pattern.
nodes.name: Upgradable

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Can't upgrade to the same contract!"

arguments.value: Can't upgrade to the same contract!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Can't upgrade to the same contract!"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The old and the new contracts should share the same owners!"

arguments.value: The old and the new contracts should share the same owners!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The old and the new contracts should share the same owners!"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Upgrade flow: triggers the upgrade callback of the old contract.
 @param _newContract address The address of the new contract which going to replace this one.
nodes.name: upgrade

nodes.documentation: @dev A callback which will be called during an upgrade and will return the status of the of upgrade.
nodes.name: onUpgrade

nodes.documentation: @title Orbs federation smart contract.
nodes.name: Federation

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor that initializes the Orbs federation contract.
 @param _members address[] The public addresses of the federation members.

@dev Returns whether a specific member exists in the federation.
 @param _member address The public address of the member to check.
nodes.name: isMember

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the federation members. Please note that this method is only required due to the current Solidity's
 version inability to support accessing another contract's array using its built-in getter.
nodes.name: getMembers

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the required threshold for consensus.
nodes.name: getConsensusThreshold

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the revision of the current federation.
nodes.name: getFederationRevision
isMemberByRevision

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the federation members by revision.
 @param _federationRevision uint The revision to query.
nodes.name: getMembersByRevision

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the required threshold for consensus by revision.
 @param _federationRevision uint The revision to query.
nodes.name: getConsensusThresholdByRevision

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds new member to the federation.
 @param _member address The public address of the new member.
nodes.name: addMember

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes existing member from the federation.
 @param _member address The public address of the existing member.
nodes.name: removeMember

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes a member by an index.
 @param _i uint The index of the member to be removed.
nodes.name: removeMemberByIndex

nodes.documentation: @dev Upgrades the Subscription Manager.
nodes.name: upgradeSubscriptionManager
findMemberIndex

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks federation members list for correctness.
 @param _members address[] The federation members list to check.
nodes.name: isFedererationMembersListValid
isMember

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the required threshold for consensus given a list of federation members.
 @param _members address[] The federation members list to check.
nodes.name: getConsensusThresholdForMembers

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
